title: Did Barbara Bush say that living in a stadium is "acting very well" for the refugees because of the hurricane?
subtitle: It is reported that Barbara Bush said that Hurricane Katrina refugees sheltered in Astrodome were "vulnerable anyway, so this works very well for them."
author: Snopes Staff
vclaim: Former First Lady Barbara Bush said that Hurricane Katrina refugees sheltered in Esterdom Houston were "weak anyway, so this works very well for them."
